title: Study: Criminals Target Defi Platforms, Steal More Than $67 Million in February Alone
description: In February alone, criminals stole digital funds worth over $67 million from decentralized finance (defi) platforms. The latest Immunefi data shows that hacking attacks accounted for more than $65 million, or 97% of the month’s losses. The Ethereum blockchain suffered the most individual attacks, with 12 incidents representing 85.71% of the total losses across targeted […]

title: AI Revolutionizing Software Development in India
description: The software development landscape in India is undergoing a profound transformation driven by the relentless advancement of Artificial Intelligence (AI). With its pervasive influence, AI is orchestrating a paradigm shift across industries, particularly within low-code development. This transformative trend is reshaping the future of software development practices and presenting significant opportunities for developers, businesses, and […]

title: Biden Calls for AI Regulation Following Incident of AI-Generated Voice Impersonation
description: In his recent State of the Union address, President Joe Biden highlighted the need for regulating artificial intelligence (AI) technologies, particularly in light of a concerning incident involving an AI-generated voice impersonating him. This call for action signals a growing recognition of the potential risks posed by AI, prompting discussions on legislative measures to address […]

title: Monopoly Go! Release the Hot Rod Event
description: Explore the excitement of Monopoly Go!'s latest event, the Hot Rod Partners, where players team up to restore classic cars and win exclusive rewards.

title: Suicide Squad Kill the Justice League Faces Steep Discount on Steam Amidst Criticism
description: Suicide Squad Kills the Justice League, a highly anticipated triple-A game developed by Rocksteady Studios and published by Warner Bros Interactive Entertainment, has encountered a significant price drop on the Steam platform merely a month after its release. Originally priced at $70, the game is now available at a 40% discount, reflecting what some consider […]

title: Web3 surveillance proves we need on-chain data ownership | Opinion
description: On-chain data ownership addresses the surveillance issue head-on, ensuring that blockchain remains a tool for empowerment rather than a passive ledger of public information, argues Matan Almakis.

title: Is Tesla Secretly Accumulating Bitcoin Again? Wallet Data Indicates $120 Million BTC Purchased
description: Tesla’s Bitcoin holdings surged to 11,509 BTC from 9,720, fueling speculation about renewed Bitcoin purchases. Despite rumors of Tesla acquiring 1,000 BTC, the company and Elon Musk remain silent, leaving the alleged purchase unconfirmed. Tesla, the electric car giant led by Elon Musk, is again under the spotlight as data from Arkham Intelligence reveals a [...]

title: Worldcoin Rebounds 85%, BNB Reaches 2-Year High – Can This Bullish Trend Last?
description:
Worldcoin, the novel iris biometric cryptocurrency project, posted a significant recovery this week. The blockchain project’s native crypto, WLD, posted a rebound from a pullback recorded earlier this week. As of Saturday morning, WLD had reached $10.6, rallying from a recent low of $5.7. WLD’s recent rally marks an 85% gain for the cryptocurrency in […]
